column4: Appeal is filed by assesse before Honle CESTAT in Appeal no ST/21224/2016-DB against order in original no 15/2016-2017 passed by Commisionerate Bangalore demanding of service tax Rs 89273737/- appropriate an amount of rs 13653321 paid by the assesse applicable interest U/s 75 of act (not quantified in the order) penalty/s 77(a) (Not quantified in the order) penalty of 89273737 In the above order in original the commissioner dropped the demand of Rs 651525282/- The commissioner of Service tax also filed an appeal and both the appeals are pending in Honble CESTAT Bengaluru  65,15,25,282 65 Crore+
